tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR,
    energy_type VARCHAR,
    consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT NOT NULL,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    consumption_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    consumption_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id INT,
  source_id INT,
  production_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_region_id FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES Region(region_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_source_id FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES EnergySource(source_id)
);
